sentence: Hospital  officials  in  Gaza  said  that  at  least  50  people  were  killed  in  the  strikes  while  more  bodies  were  being  brought  to  hospitals.

Both  were  held  on  the  second  floor  of  a  home  in  the  city  of  Rafah,  according  to  the  the  Israeli  military,  which  said  that  a  special  forces  team  broke  inside  the  home  and  engaged  in  a  firefight,  killing  militants.
More  than  1,200  people  were  killed  in  the  attacks,  according  to  Israel.
